<title level="1" pfs="">[Rust Hag](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2054)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Rust hags have a knack for technology. They make their homes in hollowedout factories, abandoned tenements, and other sites of urban decay.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Hag_RustHag.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Rust Hag](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2054)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Hag" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=84" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 84</row>

**Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** +3

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +4
</row>

**[Coven](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=11)** A rust hag adds [_curse of lost time_](/Spells.aspx?ID=683), [_rusting grasp_](/Spells.aspx?ID=711), and [_summon construct_](/Spells.aspx?ID=318) to her coven's spells.

**Items**
[Arquebus](/Weapons.aspx?ID=195) (10 rounds), [Flintlock Pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=192) (20 rounds)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +18 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)
</row>

**HP** 135

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Rules.aspx?ID=375) 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d6+10 slashing plus rusting touch

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_ghost touch arquebus_ +20 ([Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Kickback](/Traits.aspx?ID=409), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 150 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 2d8+11 piercing plus hagshot

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_ghost touch flintlock pistol_ +20 ([Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 40 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 2d4+11 piercing plus hagshot

**Change Shape** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The rust hag can take on the appearance of any Medium female [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91). This doesn't change her Speed or her Strikes, but might change the damage type her Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

**Hagshot**   Any firearm wielded by a rust hag gains the benefits of _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280)_ and [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) runes, and it functions properly no matter how rusty it gets. In addition, when a rust hag critically hits a target with a firearm, the target must succeed at a DC 26 Fortitude save or be [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).

**Rusting Touch**   A rust hag's touch causes metal to rapidly rust and corrode. If the hag succeeds at a Strike with her claw, she deals 2d6 damage (doubled on a critical hit) to a metal item the target is wearing or holding, ignoring its Hardness. If the hag hits an unattended metal item, the item takes this damage automatically. If a creature uses the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction with a metal shield against the hag's claw attack, the shield is automatically [broken](/Conditions.aspx?ID=2), but no other item is rusted on that attack. Objects made of skymetal, such as [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=271) and [orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=276), are immune to rusting touch.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="">Rust Hag Guns</title>

Rust hags use guns presented in _Pathfinder Guns & Gears_. The [concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401) and [kickback](/Traits.aspx?ID=409) weapon traits appear on page 150 of that book. If you don't want to use firearms in your campaign, then a rust hag's guns are so corroded they're valueless.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-59" />
name: Rust Hag
